movie_title: Learn English with PRIDE & PREJUDICE — Advanced Lesson
introduction: 𝗨𝗻𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗸 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦𝗢𝗡 𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗔𝗽𝗽 𝗛𝗲𝗿𝗲 👉 📲 https://bit.ly/4iJdwnl Open on

vocabulary.definition: the state of being lower in rank, status, or quality than others
vocabulary.example: Darcy struggled with the inferiority of Elizabeth's birth before deciding to put it aside.
The thought of losing her pet was a torment for the little girl.

vocabulary.definition: to persuade someone to do something
vocabulary.example: Despite her initial reluctance, he managed to prevail upon her to join the team.

vocabulary.definition: doubts or hesitations about the morality or rightness of an action
vocabulary.example: She had no scruples about lying to protect her friend.
The audience's derision towards the performer was evident in their jeers.
The acutest pain he felt was not physical but emotional.
